metadata.title: CVE-2018-20426 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libming 0.4.8 has a NULL pointer dereference in the newVar3 function of thedecompile.c file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-7866.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
